Entries.Description: The AWS .NET Mock Lambda Test Tool is now configured in launchSettings.json with a location based on %USERPROFILE% instead of %USERNAME%
Improved solution load times by only installing the Lambda Test tool once per IDE session instead of once per applicable project.
Lambda Function View Panel now shows function's state and last updated status.
Added AWS CodeArtifact in AWS Explorer with option to copy NuGet source endpoint. Added NuGet Credential Provider for CodeArtifact.
